abilities.name: Judgement of the Omnissiah
abilities.rule: Each time this model makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within Engagement Range of one or more friendly **ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE** units, you can reâ€‘roll the Wound roll.

abilities.name: Gift of the Iron Wolf
abilities.rule: In your Command phase, you can select one friendly **ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE** model within 3" of this model. That model regains up to D3 lost wounds and, until the start of your next Command phase, select one ranged weapon equipped by that model to have the **[RAPID FIRE 1]** ability. Each model can only be selected for this ability or the Blessing of the Omnissiah ability once per turn.

abilities.name: Iron Priest
abilities.rule: While this model is within 3" of one or more friendly **ADEPTUS ASTARTES VEHICLE** units, this model has the Lone Operative ability.
